title: Vanna Nilave Song Lyrics Ninaithen Vanthai
stanzas:
Vanna nilave vanna nilave
varuvadhu neethaanaa
vaasanaigal varugirathe
varuvadhu nijamthaanaa

oru nooru nilavin
velicham paathen un kannil
adi kodi puraakkal
koottam kanden
en nenjil

kanmoodinaal un niyabagam
poo pookkudhe en vaalibal

Vanna nilave vanna nilave
varuvadhu neethaanaa
vaasanaigal varugirathe
varuvadhu nijamthaanaa

Kangal ariyaa kaatrai pole
kanvil ennai thazhuviyathenna
paadhi iravil thookkathai
kalaikkum poove undhan
mugavari enna

ninaivodu thanthai ellaam
nijamaaga tharuvaaya
uyirukku uyirai thandhu
uravaada varuvaayaa

Koonthal kaattil
vazhi theriyaamal
maatik konden en vazhi enna

unnai ingae thaedi thaedi
tholaindhu ponen
en gadhi enna.

mazhai megam naan aanaal
un vaasal varuvene
un meedhu mazhai aagi
en jeevan nenaivene

kanavodu vanthaai penne
neril vara pozhudhillaiyo
thavam podhavillai endren
dhevathai varavillaiyo
